verses.verse: "Moreover you shall make <WH6213> the tabernacle <WH4908> with ten <WH6235> curtains; <WH3407> of fine twined <WH7806> linen, <WH8336> and blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8144> with cherubim. <WH4639> The work of the skillful <WH2803> workman <WH4639> you shall make them. <WH6213>

The length <WH753> of each <WH259> curtain <WH3407> shall be twenty <WH6242> eight <WH8083> cubits, <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> of each <WH259> curtain <WH3407> four <WH702> cubits: <WH520> all the curtains <WH3407> shall have one <WH259> measure. <WH4060>

Five <WH2568> curtains <WH3407> shall be coupled together <WH2266> one <WH802> to another; <WH269> and the other five <WH2568> curtains <WH3407> shall be coupled <WH2266> one <WH802> to another. <WH269>

You shall make <WH6213> loops <WH3924> of blue <WH8504> on the edge <WH8193> of the one <WH259> curtain <WH3407> from the edge <WH7098> in the coupling; <WH2279> and likewise you shall make <WH6213> in the edge <WH8193> of the curtain <WH3407> that is outmost <WH7020> in the second <WH8145> coupling. <WH4225>

You shall make <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> in the one <WH259> curtain, <WH3407> and you shall make <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> in the edge <WH7097> of the curtain <WH3407> that is in the second <WH8145> coupling. <WH4225> The loops <WH3924> shall be opposite <WH6901> one <WH802> to another. <WH269>

You shall make <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> clasps <WH7165> of gold, <WH2091> and couple <WH2266> the curtains <WH3407> one to another with <WH802> the clasps: <WH7165> and the tabernacle <WH4908> shall be a unit. <WH259>
"You shall make <WH6213> curtains <WH3407> of goats <WH5795>' hair for a covering <WH168> over the tabernacle. <WH4908> You shall make <WH6213> them eleven <WH6249> curtains. <WH3407>

The length <WH753> of each <WH259> curtain <WH3407> shall be thirty <WH7970> cubits, <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> of each <WH259> curtain <WH3407> four <WH702> cubits: <WH520> the eleven <WH6249> curtains <WH3407> shall have one <WH259> measure. <WH4060>

You shall couple <WH2266> five <WH2568> curtains <WH3407> by themselves, <WH8337> and six curtains <WH3407> by themselves, <WH3717> and shall double over the sixth <WH8345> curtain <WH3407> in the forefront <WH4136> of the tent. <WH168>

You shall make <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> on the edge <WH8193> of the one <WH259> curtain <WH3407> that is outmost <WH7020> in the coupling, <WH2279> and fifty <WH2572> loops <WH3924> on the edge <WH8193> of the curtain <WH3407> which is outmost in the second <WH8145> coupling. <WH2279>

You shall make <WH6213> fifty <WH2572> clasps <WH7165> of brass, <WH5178> and put <WH935> the clasps <WH7165> into the loops, <WH3924> and couple <WH2266> the tent <WH168> together, <WH259> that it may be one.

The overhanging <WH5629> part that remains <WH5736> of the curtains <WH3407> of the tent, <WH168> the half <WH2677> curtain <WH3407> that remains, <WH5736> shall hang <WH5628> over the back <WH268> of the tabernacle. <WH4908>

The cubit <WH520> on the one side, <WH2088> and the cubit <WH520> on the other side, <WH5736> of that which remains in the length <WH753> of the curtains <WH3407> of the tent, <WH168> shall hang <WH5628> over the sides <WH6654> of the tabernacle <WH4908> on this side and on that side, <WH3680> to cover it.
You shall make <WH6213> a covering <WH4372> for the tent <WH168> of rams <WH352>' skins <WH5785> dyed red, <WH119> and a covering <WH4372> of sea cow <WH8476> hides <WH5785> above. <WH4605>
"You shall make <WH6213> the boards <WH7175> for the tabernacle <WH4908> of acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> standing up. <WH5975>
Ten <WH6235> cubits <WH520> shall be the length <WH753> of a board, <WH7175> and one and a half <WH2677> cubits <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> of each <WH259> board. <WH7175>

There shall be two <WH8147> tenons <WH3027> in each <WH259> board, <WH7175> joined to <WH7947> one <WH259> another: <WH269> thus you shall make <WH6213> for all the boards <WH7175> of the tabernacle. <WH4908>
You shall make <WH6213> the boards <WH7175> for the tabernacle, <WH4908> twenty <WH6242> boards <WH7175> for the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward. <WH8486>

You shall make <WH6213> forty <WH705> sockets <WH134> of silver <WH3701> under the twenty <WH6242> boards; <WH7175> two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under one <WH259> board <WH7175> for its two <WH8147> tenons, <WH3027> and two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under another <WH259> board <WH7175> for its two <WH8147> tenons. <WH3027>
For the second <WH8145> side <WH6763> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> on the north <WH6828> side, <WH6763> twenty <WH6242> boards, <WH7175>
and their forty <WH705> sockets <WH134> of silver; <WH3701> two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under one <WH259> board, <WH7175> and two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under another <WH259> board. <WH7175>
For the far part <WH3411> of the tabernacle <WH4908> westward <WH3220> you shall make <WH6213> six <WH8337> boards. <WH7175>
You shall make <WH6213> two <WH8147> boards <WH7175> for the corners <WH4742> of the tabernacle <WH4908> in the far part. <WH3411>

They shall be double <WH8382> beneath, <WH4295> and in the same way <WH8382> they <WH3162> shall be whole to its top <WH7218> to one <WH259> ring: <WH2885> thus shall it be for them both; <WH8147> they shall be for the two <WH8147> corners. <WH4740>

There shall be eight <WH8083> boards, <WH7175> and their sockets <WH134> of silver, <WH3701> sixteen <WH8337> sockets; <WH134> two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under one <WH259> board, <WH7175> and two <WH8147> sockets <WH134> under another <WH259> board. <WH7175>
"You shall make <WH6213> bars <WH1280> of acacia <WH7848> wood: <WH6086> five <WH2568> for the boards <WH7175> of the one <WH259> side <WH6763> of the tabernacle, <WH4908>

and five <WH2568> bars <WH1280> for the boards <WH7175> of the other <WH8145> side <WH6763> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> and five <WH2568> bars <WH1280> for the boards <WH7175> of the side <WH6763> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> for the far part <WH3411> westward. <WH3220>
The middle <WH8484> bar <WH1280> in the midst <WH8484> of the boards <WH7175> shall pass <WH1272> through from end <WH7097> to end. <WH7097>

You shall overlay <WH6823> the boards <WH7175> with gold, <WH2091> and make <WH6213> their rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> for places <WH1004> for the bars: <WH1280> and you shall overlay <WH6823> the bars <WH1280> with gold. <WH2091>
You shall set up <WH6965> the tabernacle <WH4908> according to the way <WH4941> that it was shown <WH7200> to you on the mountain. <WH2022>

"You shall make <WH6213> a veil <WH6532> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8144> and fine twined <WH7806> linen, <WH8336> with cherubim. <WH3742> The work <WH4639> of the skillful <WH2803> workman shall it be made. <WH6213>

You shall hang <WH5414> it on four <WH702> pillars <WH5982> of acacia <WH7848> overlaid <WH6823> with gold; <WH2091> their hooks <WH2053> shall be of gold, <WH2091> on four <WH702> sockets <WH134> of silver. <WH3701>

You shall hang up <WH5414> the veil <WH6532> under the clasps, <WH7165> and shall bring <WH935> the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715> in there within <WH1004> the veil: <WH6532> and the veil <WH6532> shall separate <WH914> the holy <WH6944> place from the most <WH6944> holy for you. <WH6944>
You shall put <WH5414> the mercy seat <WH3727> on the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715> in the most <WH6944> holy place. <WH6944>

You shall set <WH7760> the table <WH7979> outside <WH2351> the veil, <WH6532> and the lampstand <WH4501> over against <WH5227> the table <WH7979> on the side <WH6763> of the tabernacle <WH4908> toward the south: <WH8486> and you shall put <WH5414> the table <WH7979> on the north <WH6828> side. <WH6763>

"You shall make <WH6213> a screen <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the Tent, <WH168> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8438> and fine twined <WH7806> linen, <WH8336> the work <WH4639> of the embroiderer. <WH7551>

You shall make <WH6213> for the screen <WH4539> five <WH2568> pillars <WH5982> of acacia, <WH7848> and overlay <WH6823> them with gold: <WH2091> their hooks <WH2053> shall be of gold: <WH2091> and you shall cast <WH3332> five <WH2568> sockets <WH134> of brass for them. <WH5178>
